name: A string of desiccated eyeballs
data: It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It decreases the users charisma unbelievably much.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'mental glance'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users shadow resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'mind link'.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'sever link'.
